label: Section 2: Skill Proficiency Scoring Methodology
instructions: Read each statement below and choose one from the 3 options that best describes your interest.

questions.label: I like reading books, magazines, newspaper, etc.
I like writing home-work, essays, composition etc.
I like talking in meetings, assembly, competitions, classrooms, etc.
I like calculating distance and time.
I like to do height, length, width, depth, weight calculations
I like to calculate cost, profit & loss, interest etc.
I like to mingle with unknown people also
I like to help people in need
I like to do things being a part of a group (studying, playing, etc.)
I like to be outdoors at all times
I can easily adapt to new environments (school, location, etc.)
I like to do certain things indoors and certain things outdoors
I browse the headings, pictures, charts before I start reading a chapter.
I make questions from a chapter before, during, and after reading it.
I try to get the meaning of new words as I see them for the first time.
I take notes as I read my text books.
I rework, rewrite, or type up my notes.
I compare my notes with a classmate.
I use a to do list to keep track of completing my academic and personal activities.
I start studying for quizzes and tests at least several days before I take them.
I start papers and projects as soon as they are assigned.
